nodes.text: Kobal's World was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories.

Atrocities were committed by the Galactic Empire on Kobal's World. A number of women and children were slaughtered there by stormtroopers. One of those stormtroopers accompanied Darth Vader to Cheelit, where Clat the Shamer used the memories to force the soldier to commit suicide.
